duties_responsibilities.duty: Professionally perform grooming services on animals as requested by pet parents and in accordance with company policy and procedure, ensuring the safety and well-being of each animal.
Complete bath services, haircut services, walk-in services (e.g. nail trims) for pets.
Provide quick and courteous service to pet parents by utilizing INTENT in the salon.
Ensure OSE standards are maintained in the department and keep a clean and safe environment for the pets in the salon.
Interact professionally and effectively through verbal and written communication with all professional contacts with emphasis on company interests.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or its equivalent (GED) is preferred.
Completed the Petco Pet Stylist Apprentice Program or a minimum of one year's experience grooming/styling pets under the leadership of a professional groomer.
Successfully complete a personal skills evaluation by a Petco Pet Stylist or Grooming Salon Manager.
